ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Barret}
“We'll wait down here.”{PAUSE}“Hurry up an' win that Chocobo Race,
an' get us outta here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
“Right, {Cloud}.
We'll be waiting and rooting for you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Red XIII}
“You're right. {Cloud} should do it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Mr.Coates
“Heh heh!
You sure got guts!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Mr.Coates
“Like I told you before, you gotta get
the boss's permission, then win the Chocobo…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Mr.Coates
“Did you kill Dyne?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Mr.Coates
“You must've.
Or you'd never be holding that thing.”{PAUSE}“…So Dyne's dead…
Maybe now,
the place'll calm down a little.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Mr.Coates
“Dyne didn't
care who anyone was…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Mr.Coates
“Huh? Oh man,
you guys are mistaken.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Mr.Coates
“I already told you,
there's only one way to get outta here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Mr.Coates
“That's to win the Chocobo Race
and that's held up there, in the Gold Saucer.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // Mr.Coates
“And, only one racer can go up at a time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // Mr.Coates
“All you need now is a manager…”{PAUSE}“To register and get a Chocobo…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // “Hi. I happened to hear your story.”

ops.raw: d0 bb ff f1 fe 00 00 17 00 f1 fe 00 00

dialogStrings: Container

Mr.Coates
“Never seen your face 'round
here before. Goin' up?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Not interested
{CHOICE}Yeah, up

Mr.Coates
“Heh heh!
You sure got guts!”

Mr.Coates
“You don't seem to understand
how things work down here.”{PAUSE}“This is the Gold Saucer's garbage dump.
And that makes alluv ya scrubs.”

Mr.Coates
“The only way to get back up there
is to win the Chocobo Race.”

Mr.Coates
“But, it's not
as easy as you rookies think.”{PAUSE}“Of course, if you got the boss's permission
it'd be a different story, but
YOU'll never get that!”

Mr.Coates
“Ha ha ha ha.”

Mr.Coates
“You want somethin'?”

{Barret}
“I want to go up.”

Mr.Coates
“Like I told you before, you gotta get
the boss's permission, then win the Chocobo…”

{Barret}
“Dyne's got his reasons
an' can't speak.”

{Barret}
“So, I got this, instead.”

Mr.Coates
“Yeah, bull--!!”

Mr.Coates
“R, right.”

Mr.Coates
“Did you kill Dyne?”

Mr.Coates
“You must've.
Or you'd never be holding that thing.”{PAUSE}“…So Dyne's dead…
Maybe now,
the place'll calm down a little.”

Mr.Coates
“Dyne didn't
care who anyone was…”

{Barret}
“The hell do YOU know!!”

Mr.Coates
“R…ight!
I mean, no, I DON'T know anything.
S…sorry.”

{Cloud}
“Then, will you
get us outta here?”

Mr.Coates
“Huh? Oh man,
you guys are mistaken.”

Mr.Coates
“I already told you,
there's only one way to get outta here.”

Mr.Coates
“That's to win the Chocobo Race
and that's held up there, in the Gold Saucer.”

Mr.Coates
“And, only one racer can go up at a time.”

{Barret}
“Say what!?”

Mr.Coates
“Noooo!
Really, even if you threaten me!!”{PAUSE}“A rule's a rule. I can't change it.”{PAUSE}“If I do, the whole system down
here'll get messed up!!
An' I can't do that!”

Mr.Coates
“OK, OK, I'll let one go up there.
After that, he's gotta deal with Dio.”

{Barret}
“Alright then.”

{Barret}
“{Cloud}, you go.”

{Barret}
“We'll wait down here.”{PAUSE}“Hurry up an' win that Chocobo Race,
an' get us outta here!”

{Red XIII}
“You're right. {Cloud} should do it.”

{Aeris}
“Yes, good luck, {Cloud}.”

{Tifa}
“Right, {Cloud}.
We'll be waiting and rooting for you.”

{Yuffie}
“Well, {Cloud}
go get 'em!”

{Cait Sith}
“OK {Cloud},
knock 'em dead!”

Mr.Coates
“Have you decided?”

Mr.Coates
“All you need now is a manager…”{PAUSE}“To register and get a Chocobo…”
“Hi. I happened to hear your story.”

Mr.Coates
“Ester?”

Ester
“I'll be your manager.”

Mr.Coates
“Well, I have nothing against it, but…”

Mr.Coates
“This is Ester. She may look kinda funny…”{PAUSE}“But there's no better manager in the races…”

Ester
“That's so rude…”

Ester
“Yeah, well.
Nice to meet you, {Cloud}.”

Mr.Coates
“All right then, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“I'll send you up the elevator.
Ester'll fill you in on the details.”
